COMMON_ONLY_YOU: ‚ùå Only you can use these buttons.
LANG_COOLDOWN: ‚è≥ You can change your language again in **{time}**.
COMP_ONLY_GUILD: ‚ö†Ô∏è This command only works inside a server.
COMP_ONLY_CONFRONTOS: ‚ö†Ô∏è This command can only be used in the competitive confrontos channel.
COMP_ONLY_ROLE: ‚ö†Ô∏è You don't have the competitive role.
COMP_PUNISHED: ‚õî You are punished and can't start/accept matches for **{seconds}s**.
COMP_LOCKED: ‚õî You already have an ongoing lock (**{type}**). Token: **{token}**.
COMP_LOCKED_PENDING_MENU:
‚õî You already opened the **challenge menu**.
‚û°Ô∏è Choose **I have an opponent** or **Search opponent** before starting another one.
COMP_LOCKED_PENDING_ASK:
‚õî You‚Äôre in the middle of the challenge.
‚û°Ô∏è Send the opponent **@ mention** in chat (you have **60s**).
COMP_LOCKED_PENDING_CONFIRM:
‚õî You already picked the opponent.
‚û°Ô∏è Now commit: **Confirm** or **Cancel** using the buttons.
COMP_LOCKED_PENDING_INVITE:
‚õî You already sent an invite.
‚û°Ô∏è Wait for the opponent to **accept or decline** before starting another challenge.
CHALLENGE_START_DESC: Hi! I saw you want to climb the ranked ladder ‚Äî but first: do you already have an opponent or do you want to search for one?
CHALLENGE_ASK_DESC:
Send a message mentioning your opponent (ex: @player).

üìå If you mention multiple users, only the **first @** will be used.
‚è≥ You have **60 seconds**.
CHALLENGE_MODAL_INVALID: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please provide a valid opponent (@ mention or ID).
CHALLENGE_OPP_NOT_FOUND: ‚ö†Ô∏è I couldn't find this opponent in the server.
CHALLENGE_CONFIRM_DESC: Do you confirm you want to start a match against {opponent}?
CHALLENGE_OPP_LOCKED: ‚ö†Ô∏è This opponent already has an active lock/match.
CHALLENGE_INVITE_SENT: üì© Invite sent to {opponent}. The match will only start when they **accept**.
CHALLENGE_INVITE_DESC:
{challenger} wants to start a match with you.

‚úÖ Accept to start.
‚ùå Decline to cancel.
CHALLENGE_INVITE_INVALID: ‚ö†Ô∏è This invite doesn‚Äôt exist (or was cleaned).
CHALLENGE_INVITE_ALREADY_HANDLED: ‚ö†Ô∏è This invite has already been handled.
CHALLENGE_CREATED: ‚úÖ Match created and now active. Token: **{token}**.
MATCH_ACTIVE_DESC: The match has been successfully started.
premiumReset.title: PREMIUM RESET
premiumReset.desc:
This feature is exclusive to **Premium** or **Mega Booster** players.

It will reset ALL of your competitive statistics.

‚ö†Ô∏è Limit: **1 reset every 31 days**.
premiumReset.notCompetitive: You must be **Competitive** to use this command.
premiumReset.cooldown:
You have already used your Premium reset recently.

‚è≥ You can use it again at: **{when}**.
premiumReset.done: ‚úÖ Premium reset completed successfully. Good luck on your comeback!
premiumReset.noAccessEmbed:
# <:az_premium:1462033257557266497> Reset my Profile

Unfortunately, this feature is only available for <@&1459815660933877820> or <@&1453129423753838602>. If you want to support our project, please contact one of our administrators.
premiumReset.confirmEmbed:
# {emoji} Reset my Profile

**First of all: thank you for supporting our project. With your help we improve Azyron every day.**

This feature allows you to reset all your competitive statistics and start fresh.

Do you want to reset your profile?
premiumReset.cancelEmbed:
# {emoji} Process finished

‚úÖ All good.

You chose **not to reset** your profile, so nothing was changed.

If you change your mind, use **/resetpremium** again.
premiumReset.done.dynamic:
{emoji} ‚úÖ Your reset has been successfully completed.

Good luck on your comeback!
premiumReset.trashTalk.en: You were *this close* to Premium‚Ä¶ almost. ü•± Want this reset? Go Premium or drop a Boost.

No Premium, no reset. This is Azyron ‚Äî even the bot has standards. üòà

You clicked with confidence‚Ä¶ but your wallet didn‚Äôt back it up. ü§ù

This isn‚Äôt a bug. It‚Äôs a paywall with personality. <:az_premium:1462033257557266497>
You tried to access Premium without Premium‚Ä¶ bold. Now go Premium and try again. üòà
Wanna unlock this skill? Premium or Mega Booster. Otherwise‚Ä¶ just cope. üíÖ
EDITOR_MAIN_DESC:
# <:bensa_this_is_fire:1453211690849145014> Stats Editor

Select one of these buttons to start editing:
EDITOR_MODAL_JUSTIFY_LABEL: Why are you editing this stat?
EDITOR_BADGES_SELECT_DESC: Select the badges you want to set for this player.
EDITOR_RIVALRIES_DESC: Choose what you want to edit:
EDITOR_GOALS_BEST_SCORED: Most goals scored in a match
EDITOR_GOALS_BEST_CONCEDED: Most goals conceded in a match
EDITOR_RANK_DESC:
Select the correct rank for this player.

üìå This will:
- set the real rank (`seasonRank`)
- adjust **minimum XP** for that rank
- apply the rank role automatically
EDITOR_RANK_DONE_HINT: ‚úÖ The rank role has been synced automatically.
